transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .goods_item.coming_soon .img_wrap:after,.goods_item.coming_soon .img_wrap:before,.goods_item.sold_out .img_wrap:after,.goods_item.sold_out .img_wrap:before{content:"";display:block}.goods_item.coming_soon .img_wrap:before,.goods_item.sold_out .img_wrap:before{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3);background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;bottom:0;left:0;position:absolute;right:0;top:0;z-index:1}.goods_item.coming_soon.sold_out .img_wrap:before,.goods_item.sold_out.sold_out .img_wrap:before{background-image:url(/_nuxt/assets/images/ui/overlay_soldout.png)}.goods_item.coming_soon.coming_soon .img_wrap:before,.goods_item.sold_out.coming_soon .img_wrap:before{background-image:url(/_nuxt/assets/images/ui/overlay_comingsoon.png)}.goods_item .img_wrap{overflow:hidden;position:relative}.goods_item .img_wrap .thumb{display:block;height:320px;position:relative}.goods_item .img_wrap .thumb em{align-items:center;bottom:0;display:flex;left:0;position:absolute;right:0;top:0}.goods_item .img_wrap .thumb em img{display:block;height:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%}.goods_item .img_wrap .thumb em.overflip{bottom:50%;opacity:0;top:50%;transition:all .3s ease-out}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox{background-color:#00bc70;bottom:0;display:flex;justify-content:space-around;left:0;position:absolute;right:0;transform:translateY(100%);transition:transform .3s ease-out;z-index:1}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox button{background-color:transparent;font-size:0;height:auto;padding:14px 5px}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox button em{background-image:url(/_nuxt/assets/images/common/icon_split.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;height:32px;padding:0;width:32px}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox button.btn_heart em{background-position:-220px 0}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox button.btn_cart em{background-position:-280px 0}.goods_item .img_wrap .btnIconBox button.btn_buy em{background-position:-340px 0}.goods_item .img_wrap:hover .overflip{bottom:0!important;left:0!important;opacity:1!important;right:0!important;top:0!important}.goods_item .img_wrap:hover .btnIconBox{transform:translateY(0)}.goods_item .cont{margin-top:20px}.goods_item .cont .cate{font-weight:600;margin-right:5px}.goods_item .cont .name strong{color:#666;font-size:14px;font-weight:400}.goods_item .cont>.price{margin:10px 0 20px}.goods_item .cont>.price strong{font-size:20px;font-weight:700;margin-right:10px}.goods_item .cont>.price span{color:red;font-size:20px;font-weight:300;margin-right:15px}.goods_item .cont>.price em{color:#999e9c;font-size:14px;font-weight:300;text-decoration:line-through}.goods_item .cont .review_score{align-items:center;color:#999e9c;display:flex;font-size:12px;margin-top:20px}.goods_item .cont .review_score:before{background-image:url(/_nuxt/assets/images/common/icon_split.png);background-position:-400px 0;background-repeat:no-repeat;content:"";display:block;height:12px;margin-right:2px;width:12px}.goods_item .cont .review_score em{margin-left:5px}
